# TwinPrimitiveExtensions.GetShadowValue&lt;T&gt; method

Get current shadow value of the primitive item.

```csharp
public static T GetShadowValue<T>(this OnlinerBase primitive)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Type of value to return. |
| primitive | Primitive item of which the value will be retrieved. |

## Return Value

Shadow value of the primitive item.
